org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.common.statistics

Class GraphStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.common.statistics.GraphStatistics

  • public class GraphStatistics
extends Object
    Represents several statistics related to a LogicalGraph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphStatistics(long vertexCount, long edgeCount, long distinctSourceVertexCount, long distinctTargetVertexCount)
      Constructor using basic statistics.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getDistinctEdgeProperties(String propertyName)
      Returns the number of distinct edge property values for given property name
      Eg (name) -> 20
      long getDistinctEdgeProperties(String edgeLabel, String propertyName)
      Returns the number of distinct property values for given edge label property name pair
      Eg (Person, name) -> 20
      long getDistinctSourceVertexCount()
      Returns the number of distinct source vertices.
      long getDistinctSourceVertexCount(String edgeLabel)
      Returns the number of distinct source vertices incident to an edge with the specified label.
      long getDistinctTargetVertexCount()
      Returns the number of distinct target vertices.
      long getDistinctTargetVertexCount(String edgeLabel)
      Returns the number of distinct target vertices incident to an edge with the specified label.
      long getDistinctVertexProperties(String propertyName)
      Returns the number of distinct vertex property values for given property name
      Eg (name) -> 20
      long getDistinctVertexProperties(String vertexLabel, String propertyName)
      Returns the number of distinct property values for given vertex label property name pair
      Eg (Person, name) -> 20
      long getEdgeCount()
      Returns the number of edges in the graph
      long getEdgeCount(String edgeLabel)
      Returns the number of edges with the specified label.
      long getEdgeCountBySource(String vertexLabel, String edgeLabel)
      Returns the number of edges with a specified source vertex label and edge label.
      long getEdgeCountByTarget(String vertexLabel, String edgeLabel)
      Returns the number of edges with a specified target vertex label and edge label.
      long getVertexCount()
      Returns the number of vertices in the graph.
      long getVertexCount(String vertexLabel)
      Returns the number of vertices with the specified label.
      String toString()
